item.title: FRP端口转发搭建
item.author: Author
item.description: frpc在Windows端的使用 1 修改frpc.ini 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 [common] server_addr = 服务器地址 server_port = 服务器段frps.ini中开放的端口 [ssh] type = tcp local_ip =

item.title: VIM快速配置
item.author: Author
item.description: VIM 编辑器快速配置 基础插件 安装ctags, vim-scripts, vim-addon-manager, taglist, winmanager, 以Debian类系统为例. 1 2 3 4 5 6 sudo apt-get install vim sudo apt-get install ctags sudo apt-get install vim-scripts sudo apt-get install vim-addon-manager vim-addons install taglist vim-addons install winmanager 若后续安装
